name: stars.add
desc:
This method adds a star to an item (message, file, file comment, channel, private group, or DM) on behalf of the authenticated user.
One of file, file_comment, channel, or the combination of channel and timestamp must be specified.

file_comment.desc: File comment to add star to.

channel.desc: Channel to add star to, or channel where the message to add star to was posted (used with timestamp).

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to add star to.

errors.bad_timestamp: Value passed for timestamp was invalid.
errors.message_not_found: Message specified by channel and timestamp does not exist.
errors.file_not_found: File specified by file does not exist.
errors.file_comment_not_found: File comment specified by file_comment does not exist.
errors.channel_not_found: Channel, private group, or DM specified by channel does not exist.
errors.no_item_specified: file, file_comment, channel and timestamp was not specified.
errors.already_starred: The specified item has already been starred by the authenticated user.
errors.account_inactive: Authentication token is for a deleted user or team.
errors.user_is_bot: This method cannot be called by a bot user.
